title: All cards now sold.  raw T205's for sale
author: Econteachert205

posts.post_title: All cards now sold.  raw T205's for sale
posts.post_content:
Parting with a few more 05's. shipping included.  Offers welcome

Speaker: Now 125 Now 145 was $175.  This card has one speck of paper loss on back and the obvious spot on front but other than that presents well.  No creases, measures correctly.  

Sold : it Collins mouth closed now $40 was $50.  Presentable low grade example with a few creases.

Griffith now $32, was $35 was $40. Two big horizontal creases.

Bresnahan Mouth closed now 35 was $40 was $45: Upper right crease but a very nice low grade example.

SOLD::Dahlen $55: Will only grade auth because of unnatural rounding bottom corners.  Great image, no creases, spots of paper loss on back.

Latham now23 was $25 was $30: In my opinion it is a solid vg card. Nice image

Sold::Rucker $23: In my opinion is in good condition.
I'll take Collins at $40.  PM on the way.
Just the Latham.  Cards will be for sale until Sunday, then I'll throw them on the bay 9.99 start.
Bump for final reduction of prices before ebay.
